content: this legal text discusses the division of ownership of several garages located on the ground floor of a building the garages are owned by different individuals the text specifies the details of each individuals ownership rights including the cadastral income and the value assigned to each share of ownership the parties involved in the agreement are identified by their initials they have agreed to terminate the existing coownership and divide the garages into four shares the text then provides the details of each share including the location of the garage the cadastral income and the assigned value the summary concludes by mentioning the number of the registry and the date of the agreement
